gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Lib

Class CombineRecords

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Lib.CombineRecords

  • public class CombineRecords
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods of combining Lvg output records by specifying different rules. It is utilized under Lvg Output filter options.

    History:

    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BY_CATEGORY
      Combine record by category: input term, output term, flow history and flow number must be the same
      static int BY_EUI
      Combine record by EUI: input term, output term, flow history, and flow number must be the same
      static int BY_INFLECTION
      Combine record by inflection: input term, output term, flow history, and flow number must be the same
      static int BY_NONE
      No combine rule specified
      static int BY_TERM
      Combine record by output: input term, output term, flow history, and flow number must be the same

      Constructor and Description
      CombineRecords()

    • Method Detail

      • Combine

        public static java.util.Vector<LexItem> Combine(java.util.Vector<LexItem> ins,
                                                int rule)
        Combine Lvg output records (LexItem) by specifing the combining rule
        Parameters:
        ins - Lvg output records (LexItem) to be combined
        rule - combining rule, by same output, EUI, category, or inflection
        Returns:
        Vector - the input Vector
        See Also:
        LexItem
